simplesect.para: uint32_t cam color format, like CAM_COLOR_FORMAT_RGB565

briefdescription.para: CAM set high and low limits of color key.

simplesect.para: this API will stop CAM immediately no matter there's any frame is being processed or not

detaileddescription.para: This function is used to enable CAM binary output after the CAM is initialized by the cam_init.
This function is used to enable CAM argb8888 pixel output after the CAM is initialized by the cam_init and input pixel byte order is configured by the cam_set_input_pixel_byte_order.

briefdescription.para: CAM set input pixel byte order.
Check CAM status according to the given status mask.

parameterdescription.para: if any bit in given mask is set
if none of any bit in given mask is set

briefdescription.para: Clear CAM status according to the given status mask.

simplesect.para: this API will wait for end-of-frame event before stopping CAM
